name: Silly's Playhouse
description:
Introduction

Silly's Playhouse is a game I made for my Level Design class at Cogswell. This is also my first 3D game in Unity. It was a lot of work, and I'm extremely happy with the results.

Description

My level takes place in the present day, in an underground dungeon. You have been kidnapped, and you don’t remember who you are. Your captor is Sully Mottz, better known as “Silly.” He was the main star of a hit children's TV program, “Silly’s Playhouse.” But the show has been canceled, and his life spiraled out of control. Silly blames you for ruining his life, and wants revenge!

You must use Sully's Match Gun to clear obstacles and reach the exit. The gun allows the user to destroy groups consisting of at least three identical and adjacent objects.

Credits
